text: kya ve chale-phire nahin dharatee mein, phir dekhate ki kaisa raha unaka parinaam, jo inase pahale the? ve inase adhik the shakti mein. unhonne jota-boya dharatee ko aur use aabaad kiya, usase adhik, jitana inhonne aabaad kiya aur aaye unake paas unake rasool khulee nishaaniyaan (pramaan) lekar. to nahin tha allaah ki unapar atyaachaar karata aur parantu ve svayan apane oopar atyaachaar kar rahe the
